name: Fizzy Wizzy
overview: Can you as BILLY BUBBLE, pass your FIZZICAL!! Through six exciting screens of arcade action you must collect the physical training apparatus and take it to the gym!! BEWARE the sharp points which will burst your bubble, avoid the vampire bat and his friends Sergeant Squashum and Sue Soap!! WATCH your FIZZ, this is your time left!! Drink the glasses of Wizzyade to increase your FIZZ!!
